sentences.sContent: I’ve always been perfectly healthy until now.
sentences.sCn: 直到现在，我的身体一直非常健康。

sentences.sContent: ...the report portrays an overall optimism borne by the recent healthy real-estate “upcycle” and improving economy...
...combined with their own personal characteristics—how healthy they feel they are...
...Some fast-food firms provide healthy food to give the impression they are helping to tackle the obesity problem...
...Walt Riker of McDonald's claims the change it has made in its menu means it offers more healthy items than it did a few years ago...
...simply offering a healthy option may not be good enough...
...that menu-labelling could favour chains that have more healthy offerings...
...each of us needs about 8 hours of sleep each day to keep us healthy and happy...
...This is just one way to get everyone involved in making school lunch healthy and fun...

synos.tran: 健康的，健全的；有益于健康的

words.tran: 健康的；有益健康的；卫生的
医疗保健；健康护理，健康服务；卫生保健

trans.tranOther: physically strong and not likely to become ill or weak
